body: Specific unique beings (deities or similar great powers) have the ability to alter objects, creatures, and the landscape on planes with this trait. They may cause these areas to change instantly and dramatically, creating great kingdoms for themselves. Ordinary characters find these planes similar to alterable planes in that they may be affected by spells and physical effort.
name: Divinely Morphic
url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Planar Adventures/Planar Traits/Morphic Traits/Divinely Morphic
